title: Black Oscars, Church Complaints, KC Chiefs, JAB Assisted Living and more.
itunes:title: Black Oscars, Church Complaints, KC Chiefs, JAB Assisted Living and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This is show is dedicated to those who are doing well. Happy Monday!!! Fool #2 has the MACP just for us. Is there a snitch problem in the Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem? O.J. Simpson has his opinion on the Gayle King situation. The Kansas City Chiefs continue the celebration in Sin City. Tom Perez shows no signs of resigning after Iowa 'debacle' and he is mad as hell. In Movie Trivia we guess our favorite lines in classic black movies. A former TSA agent is charged with a felony stemming from an incident at LAX in June 2019. Congrats to J. Anthony Brown because he will be in Tyler Perry's Assisted Living. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog wants us to do a better job of taking care of one another, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
